name: Wings
steps: Pre-heat the oven to 425
Ensure Wing quality (separated, no tips, no excess skin/fat/bone)
Dry Wings by patting them down with a paper towel
Mix Baking Powder, Flour, Salt, and Black Pepper in a large plastic bag
Put Wings in the bag
Roll Wings in the bag until each Wing is fully coated
Spread Vegetable Oil very conservatively on a pan (a very thin layer)
For each wing
Remove from the bag
Shake off excess dry ingredients back into bag
Place on pan (with room to breath), fatty-side down
Drip Vegetable Oil conservatively on the Wing (3 drops per Wing)
Put in the oven until Wings are brown on bottom (20 min)
Flip each Wing
Place the pan back in the oven until brown on bottom (20 min)
Take Wings out of the oven (once done cooking)
Put Wings in a tossing bowl big enough to toss the Wings in
Pour 2/3 of your Sauce over the Wings in the bowl
Toss the Wings until covered in sauce
Drizzle remaining Sauce on top and serve with Blue Cheese
